name: find
description: Returns the number of the bag with the bad money.

params.name: scale
params.description: A function that takes an array of coins as a parameter and returns the weight of the coins.

params.name: bags
params.description: An array of bags. Each bag is an object with two functions.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The unique id of the bag. You have to return the id of the bad bag.

properties.name: getCoins
properties.description: Takes a number of coinsout of the bag and returns a array of coins.

params.name: numberOfCoins
params.description: The number of coins to take out of the bag.
